TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ColorTranslator extends System.Object

summary.span: 색을 GDI+ 구조체로 변환하거나 구조체에서 변환합니다.

span.span: Translates colors to and from GDI+ structures.
This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Drawing.Color FromHtml (string htmlColor);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Color FromHtml(string htmlColor) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromHtml (htmlColor As String) As Color
public: static System::Drawing::Color FromHtml(System::String ^ htmlColor);

span.span: The string representation of the Html color to translate.

summary.span: HTML 색 표현을 GDI+ 구조체로 변환합니다.

span.span: Translates an HTML color representation to a GDI+ structure.

returns.span: 가 인 경우 변환된 HTML 색을 나타내는 구조체 또는 입니다.

span.span: The structure that represents the translated HTML color or if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 메서드는 HTML 색의 이름에는 파란색 이나 빨간색 GDI + 등의 문자열 표현을 변환 구조입니다.This method translates a string representation of an HTML color name, such as Blue or Red, to a GDI+ structure. ## Examples 다음 예제는 Windows Forms에서 사용 하도록 설계 되었으며 필요 `e`의 매개 변수는 이벤트 처리기입니다.The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 코드 변환 하는 HTML 색 이름을 구조 및 해당 색 채울 사각형을 사용 합니다.The code translates an HTML color name to a structure, and then uses that color to fill a rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 이 올바른 HTML 색 이름이 아닌 경우

span.span: is not a valid HTML color name.

span.span: The OLE color to translate.

summary.span: OLE 색상 값을 GDI+ 구조체로 변환합니다.

span.span: Translates an OLE color value to a GDI+ structure.

returns.span: 변환된 OLE 색을 나타내는 구조체를 반환합니다.

span.span: The structure that represents the translated OLE color.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제는 Windows Forms에서 사용 하도록 설계 되었으며 필요 `e`의 매개 변수는 이벤트 처리기입니다.The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 코드에는 OLE 색 값을 변환는 구조 및 해당 색 채울 사각형을 사용 합니다.The code translates an OLE color value to a structure, and then uses that color to fill a rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제는 Windows Forms에서 사용 하도록 설계 되었으며 필요 `e`의 매개 변수는 이벤트 처리기입니다.The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. Windows 색 값을 변환 하는 코드는 구조 및 해당 색 채울 사각형을 사용 합니다.The code translates a Windows color value to a structure, and then uses that color to fill a rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

.method public static hidebysig string ToHtml(valuetype System.Drawing.Color c) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToHtml (c As Color) As String
public: static System::String ^ ToHtml(System::Drawing::Color c);

span.span: The structure to translate.

summary.span: 지정된 구조체를 HTML 문자열 색 표현으로 변환합니다.

span.span: Translates the specified structure to an HTML string color representation.
The string that represents the HTML color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 메서드 변환 하는 구조체를 HTML 색의 문자열 표현입니다.This method translates a structure to a string representation of an HTML color. "Red", "Blue" 또는 "녹색"와 같은 색의 자주 사용 되는 이름과 "FF33AA" 등의 숫자 색 값의 문자열 표현이 아니라입니다.This is the commonly used name of a color, such as "Red", "Blue", or "Green", and not string representation of a numeric color value, such as "FF33AA". ## Examples 다음 예제는 Windows Forms에서 사용 하도록 설계 되었으며 필요 `e`의 매개 변수는 이벤트 처리기입니다.The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 변환 하는 코드는 결과 문자열에 있는 메시지 상자를 HTML 색을 다음의 문자열 표현으로 구성 합니다.The code translates a structure to a string representation of an HTML color, and then shows a message box with the resulting string. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

public: static int ToOle(System::Drawing::Color c);

span.span: The structure to translate.
Translates the specified structure to an OLE color.
The OLE color value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제는 Windows Forms에서 사용 하도록 설계 되었으며 필요 `e`의 매개 변수는 이벤트 처리기입니다.The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 변환 하는 코드는 구조체를 OLE 색을 나타내며 다음 결과 문자열이 포함 된 메시지 상자를 표시 하는 정수입니다.The code translates a structure to an integer that represents an OLE color, and then shows a message box with the resulting string. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

span.span: The structure to translate.
Translates the specified structure to a Windows color.
The Windows color value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제는 Windows Forms에서 사용 하도록 설계 되었으며 필요 `e`의 매개 변수는 이벤트 처리기입니다.The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 변환 하는 코드는 구조체 Windows 색을 나타내는 한 다음 결과 문자열에 있는 메시지 상자를 표시 하는 정수입니다.The code translates a structure to an integer that represents a Windows color, and then shows a message box with the resulting string. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]
